name: pushkontak
description: Catatan jangan menggunakan nomor whatsapp pribadi untuk Push Kontak/Broadcast(Spam), Jika terdapat kendala di akun anda bukan tanggung jawab kami. DWYOR Do With Your Own Risk

scripts.code: rm -rf ./data/auth && rm -rf ./data/store.json && echo '[]' > ./data/users.json && echo '[]' > ./data/histories.json && node index.js --number
scripts.qr: rm -rf ./data/auth && rm -rf ./data/store.json && echo '[]' > ./data/users.json && echo '[]' > ./data/histories.json && node index.js
